To write a letter to your boss requesting a raise, follow these steps:

1. Fitar da sunan shugaban aikinka: A kan wannan wasu sunanu, ka fitar da sunan shugaban aikinka don sa ka bayyana shugabanninka na aikin da kake zarginsa da ƙarya.

2. Bayyana tattaunawa: Bayyana tsarin da aka sanya ka yi a kan aikinka a wannan lokaci, kamar yadda ka yi aikin da ka yi a kan zazzaunawa, kudi, ko damuwa da kuma kasuwanci. Bayyana abubuwan da aka yi aikinka da suka shafi tsari.

3. Bayyana abubuwan da za a yi ko zama a yi: Bayyana abubuwan da aka yi aikinka, kamar yadda za a yi a cikin shugabanninka domin shi ya sanya ka girma. Misali, ka bayyana abubuwan da ka yi a cikin aikin don ya nuna cewa ka fi so ka zargi ƙarya domin ka yi zaman lafiya sosai.

4. Bayyana sababbin kyauta: Bayyana sababbin kyauta da za a yi aikinka domin ka yi ƙarya da zargin.

5. Bayyana kyauta: Bayyana kyautar zargin da za a yi aikinka, misali, ka bayyana cewa aikinka ya fi so ka zargin 10% ko kuma ka fi so ka zargin a kan layin waje na aikin.

6. Bayyana tarin kudi: Bayyana tarin kudi da za a yi aikinka. Don haka, ka bayyana cewa kudin da za a yi aikinka zai yi yawa ko kuma zai yi ƙarya sosai.
